Question: His three children with Della, this person, Jr., David and Robert, were born in 1955, 1958 and 1960, respectively.
Hints: Individuals such as Quincy Jones and Reverend Henry Griffin felt that those around this person were responsible for his drug use.
In school, this person was taught only classical music, but he wanted to play the jazz and blues he heard on the family radio.
This person found Tallahassee musically exciting too, and sat in with the Florida A&M University student band.
